verses.roman:
śuniyā rājāra vinaya prabhura ānanda
hena-kāle āilā tathā rāya bhavānanda

synonyms: śuniyā—hearing; rājāra—of the King; vinaya—submission; prabhura ānanda—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu became very happy; hena-kāle—at this time; āilā—arrived; tathā—there; rāya bhavānanda—Bhavānanda Rāya.
translation: Having heard from Kāśī Miśra all these statements concerning the King's mentality, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was very happy. At that time, Bhavānanda Rāya also arrived there.
